publications.title: Unveiling Deception: Evaluating NLPâ€™s Effectiveness in Identifying Misleading Responses from Large Language Models
publications.abstract: This paper evaluates the effectiveness of Natural Language Processing techniques in identifying misleading or deceptive responses generated by Large Language Models.

publications.title: Unveiling shadows: A data-driven insight on depression among Bangladeshi university students
publications.abstract: A data-driven study that provides insights into the prevalence and factors related to depression among university students in Bangladesh.

publications.title: Forecasting Meteorological Solar Irradiation Using Machine Learning and N-BEATS Architecture
publications.abstract: Presents a machine learning model utilizing the N-BEATS architecture to accurately forecast solar irradiation based on meteorological data.

publications.title: Implementing Biometric or Graphical Password Authentication in a Universal Three-Factor Authentication System
publications.abstract: Details the implementation of a three-factor authentication system that incorporates either biometric or graphical password methods for enhanced security.

publications.title: Identifying Hurricane Damage using Explainable Compact Transformer with Convolutional Embedding
publications.abstract: This study uses an explainable compact transformer model with convolutional embeddings to identify and assess damage caused by hurricanes from images.
